title: please respond riot im really confused
body: ok riot i was banned a while ago for flameing my team. that was last year it is a new year and i haven't been typing in chat at all and i have a restriction with not being able to ear rewards. and i feel like its bugged or you guys forgot to take it off i have been on my best behavior and i have actually played better since i was banned because i learned and i have ranked up but im really confused as to why i cant earn anymore rewards please help me riot im really confused as to why im still not able to get them..

replies.body: Toxic, mate i see you complaining about different **** like that on here daily. Just /mute all and wait for it to change. You either haven't reformed or you have but it hasn't been long enough according to riot. It's annoying i know. Best is to take a break from serious playing and have some fun.
ive complain twice man  was mainly confused really

You need to first wait til the whatever punishment finishes, then a couple months of non-negative behaviour record (I think it was 3 months? Might need clarification) to resume your eligibility for freebies and other rewards.

I think.

Since the punishment has already ended, should be able to earn end of season rewards (presuming OP refrians from toxicity and doesn't get banned). 

As for hextech loot and other free stuff, there isn't actually a set period you have to wait out before you can start getting it again. It's called the ["reform period" and the amount of time is completely dependent on the player](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions). 

Refrain from being a ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ and be hoarding that hextech loot before you know it. 
Alternatively, if one continues being an ♥ ♥ ♥ during this period and keeps getting reported, its going to take a while.
